entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the evening. Rain mixed with snow late in the evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing late in the evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 60 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
